sentences.en: Agassiz recognized marks of glaciation all over northern Europe.
sentences.cn: 阿加西斯发现了整个北欧的冰川标志.

sentences.en: Besides the Bow Valley, evidence of glaciation also appears in this image south of the lake, in the amphitheater-shaped cirque.
sentences.cn: 除了被迷你汪卡湖占据的弓河谷外，冰川作用的证据还可以在南部的圆形冰斗处找到。

sentences.en: During the Pleistocene Ice Age , the ancient drainage systems were almost completely rearranged by glaciation.
sentences.cn: 在更新世冰期, 古水系常被冰川作用完全改造.

sentences.en: Geologically speaking, the park's landscape was formed by two processes: mountain - building and glaciation.
sentences.cn: 地质上说, 公园的景观形成了两个过程: 山区建设和冰川.

sentences.en: The Neoporoterozoic Altungol and Huangyanggou formations in Tarim plate: Recognized newly glaciation and interglaciation?
sentences.cn: 塔里木板块上元古界阿勒通沟组和黄羊沟组: 新识别的冰期和间冰期?

sentences.en: These changes alter the intensity of sunlight hitting the Earth at high latitudes, and so affect the extent of glaciation.
sentences.cn: 这些变化改变了高纬度区域的日照强度，由此影响了冰河作用的范围。

words.tran_cn: 受到冰河作用的；冻结成冰的
使冰冻；被冰冻盖；使受冰川作用

trans.tran_en: the process in which land is covered by glaciers, or the effect this process has
